stake.description: Stake LikeCoin to earn 10,000,000 LIKE rewards and voting power.

confirm-by-signing.message: Please review the sign message from your ETH wallet
confirm-by-signing.title: Confirm by signing

introduction.text: LikeCoin token has upgraded to v3 and launched on Base chain of Ethereum. Please upgrade your LikeCoin v2 token before Dec 31, 2025 avoid loss of fund.
introduction.title: Introduction

messages.p1: Congratulations, your LikeCoin has been upgraded to v3.
messages.p2: Please stake your LikeCoin to earn 10,000,000 LIKE rewards and voting power.

migration-progress.balance-remaining-message: There are still balance left, do you want to restart the migration?
migration-progress.title: Migration in Progress

wallet-connect-error.insufficient-current-balance: No LikeCoin v2 token in the wallet
wallet-connect-error.insufficient-estimated-balance: No LikeCoin v3 token will be received
wallet-connect-error.pool-balance-insufficient: Sorry, we don't have sufficient balance to complete your request. Please contact support.
